Source code for blog.models

from django.db import models
from django.contrib.auth.models import User
from django.templatetags.static import static

STATUS = (
    (0,"Draft"),
    (1,"Publish")
)


[docs]class Post(models.Model):
    """
    This class is used to post a blog.

        :param str title: The Title of the Blog
        :param str slug: Description of blog used in web address
        :param str content: The content of the post
        :param date update_on: The last time changes were made to the blog
        :param date created_on: The date the first instance of the blog was created
        :param boolean status: Is the blog posted or still in draft
    """
    title = models.CharField(max_length=200, unique=True)
    slug = models.SlugField(max_length=200, unique=True)
    content = models.TextField()
    updated_on = models.DateTimeField(auto_now= True)
    created_on = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
    status = models.IntegerField(choices=STATUS, default=0)

    class Meta:
        """
        This class provides the parameter that will determine the listing order of the blog entries

            :param list ordering: Contaning the data that orders the blog entries
        """
        ordering = ['-created_on']

    def __str__(self):
        """
        Constructor method
        """
        return self.title


[docs]    def img_url(self):
        """
        Returns a url that points to the image for the blog where image has the same name as the slug of the blog
        """
        return static("images/{}.jpg".format(self.slug))
